document_data.name: Twilight Hunters
document_data.mainbody: '''Twilight Hunters''' was a tavern located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The tavern sat in the eastern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] on the west side of the northern end of [[Nindabar Street]] just one building south of [[Saerdoun Street]]. The rear of the tavern faced an open courtyard.
